attributes.action: set up a National Rail Council comprising representatives from Network Rail, the Train Operating companies,the Department of Transport,Passenger and Freight User groups and specialist academics to run the system as an integrated part of the National Transport network.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The present railway set up is not functioning properly -there is no apparent collective responsibility or long term future planning. I would like a National Rail Council to be formed comprising all the current interested parties with appropriate powers and on which passenger and business customer groups would have a say.
